content:
Hello
I started course 'Mechanics of proofs' with uses lean4 and mathlib4. I followed the instructions to set up lean4 and elan to start working on vs code on my laptop. But every time i open , there is an error for mathlib4 stating unknown package.
I have verified that lean4 and elan and mathlib4 is installed. I have add leanprover to the system variables path.
Screenshot-2024-04-21-114537.png
can someone help me out

Are you requiring Mathlib in lakefile.lean? That is, does it contain something like this:

require mathlib from git "https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4.git"@"v4.7.0"
Oh actually, in the bottom right of your screenshot it says "Open folder is not a valid Lean 4 project". So maybe try opening just the math2001 directory in VS Code.
Advice to change the lakefile or run lake update is guaranteed to be wrong.
This is indeed a problem with opening the wrong folder.
Kamanpreet Singh has marked this topic as resolved.
